about_the_game:
Plan your route, activate elemental fields


Connect to base stations freely, design your multiple defensive lines, activate elemental fields, and damage or interfere with the enemy. But please note that this is the last line of defense for your home, and being too far away from the main base may lead to undesirable consequences...



Upgrade the convoys, crush an endless sea of monsters


Step into the world of Loopstructor , featuring an unmatched battle train system. Witness each convoy's rapid growth in the heat of battle. Immerse yourself in screens aglow with gunfire, missiles, frosty flames and lightning strikes —— the cooler the special effects, the swifter the demise of your foes! Crush the audacious enemy daring enough to face their own doom.



Free combination, exploring brand new weapons


Get ready for intense gaming thrills as you command our cutting-edge battle cart!Machine gun carts, rocket carts and chaining carts combine endlessly, with more hidden weapons waiting for you to discover and synthesize. Every round is a completely new version you've never seen before.
1 + 1 > 2? 1 + 1 + 1 + 1 + 1 + 1 + ... Of course, it's infinite!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 processor or later that's SSE2 capable
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD 630
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: This is a strategy game that combines tower defence with Roguelike.Unlike traditional tower defense game, the towers in the game are vehicles that move along ‘loops’.You need to create defence loop and build battle trains to defend against enemy attacks.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
